camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.sprea.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.spreadsheetId
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.sprea.description: The Spreadsheet ID to be used as events source

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.clien.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.clientId
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.clien.description: Client ID of the sheets application

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.clien.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.clientSecret
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.clien.description: Client Secret of the sheets application

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.acces.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.accessToken
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.acces.description: OAuth 2 access token for google sheets application. This typically expires after an hour so refreshToken is recommended for long term usage.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.refre.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.refreshToken
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.refre.description: OAuth 2 refresh token for google sheets application. Using this, the Google Calendar component can obtain a new accessToken whenever the current one expires - a necessity if the application is long-lived.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.delay
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.repea.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.repeatCount
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.repea.description: Specifies a maximum limit of number of fires

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.split.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.splitResults
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.split.description: True if value range result should be split into rows or columns to process each of them individually.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.range.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.range
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.range.description: The range of rows and columns in a sheet to get data from. Example: A1:B3

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.major.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.majorDimension
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.major.description: Specifies the major dimension that the given values should use (ROWS or COLUMNS). Example: ROWS

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.colum.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.columnNames
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-source.colum.description: Optional custom column names that map to cell coordinates based on their position.
